meanings.definition: A type of plant with pink or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cuckooflowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked some cuckooflowers to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the cuckooflowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of cuckooflowers.
meanings.sent5: The gentle scent of cuckooflowers filled the air.

meanings.definition: The flowers of the cuckooflower plant.
meanings.sent1: She admired the delicate petals of the cuckooflowers.
meanings.sent2: The cuckooflowers swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The children made colorful crowns out of cuckooflowers.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a patch of cuckooflowers.
meanings.sent5: The cuckooflowers added a touch of beauty to the landscape.

meanings.definition: To plant cuckooflowers in the garden.
meanings.sent1: I will cuckooflowers in the flower bed tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys cuckooflowering in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally cuckooflowered the seeds in the wrong spot.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening cuckooflowers knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The gardener carefully cuckooflowered each plant in its place.
